page.title: 20Attitudes. My Home Town
page.content: I like living in Chepstow because I have many friends,there are plenty of things to do and the houses where I live are very nice and comfortable. There is a Leiesure Centre up the road and I often go swimming there.There are two parks and lots of shops.I particulary like the gift shops as well as the sweet shops.There is a castle and a museum you vist.There are lots of things in the museum from mangles to cameras and clothes and it is a lovely place to wander around. When I grow up I think I will move away from Chepstow although it is a nice place but I probably will be sad leaving after living here for so many years.
